slide_1.description_1: The first App allowing People around the World to earn money with the Internet.
slide_1.description_2: Everywhere you're connected on any device for your favorite Apps and Websites.

slide_2.description_1: Making you closer to your favorite Brands and Products on a new Experience.
slide_2.description_2: Getting your commission when you see our Advertisers Ads or when you perform actions.

slide_3.description_1: Full Data control and Privacy settings, for your Profile, Demographics and Interests.
slide_3.description_2: Let's start, follow the next steps, fill out your data, increase your value and start earning money.

settings.Account_deactivation_text_2: However, you can reactivate your account by logging in to the app when you want and all your data will be restored.

help.welcome_text_1: Do you need some help? Find an answer to your question on the FAQ below.
help.faq_answer_1: Rentork is an Artificial Intelligence App and an Advertising Solution allowing users to earn money by renting their data. Advertisers can create targeted campaigns to reach specific people and will pay depending on the user's profile value and his interests. Each time an advertiser is charged for a view or an action on his ads, the user gets his commission.
help.faq_question_2: 2. What is the minimum age to participate?
help.faq_answer_2: Minimum age to use Rentork is 13 years old. However, if you are under 18, you need to download the Authorization Form and get it signed by your parents.
help.faq_question_3: 3. Do I have to fill out all the fields?
help.faq_answer_3: No, you do not have to fill all the fields, but the more you fill out, the more your profile value increases.
help.faq_question_4: 4. Is my data secured and how?
help.faq_answer_4: Yes, your data is highly secured on the cloud with a SHA256 encryption.
help.faq_question_5: 5. Do advertisers have access to my data?
help.faq_answer_5: No, your data is confidential and only used for ad targeting, no advertiser has access to it unless you sign up for a service and you allow access to it.
help.faq_answer_6: The value of your profile is calculated according to the information filled in on the application. More detailed your profile is, the more your value increases and the more you earn when you see one of our ads or perform an action.
help.faq_question_7: 7. When/Where do I earn money and how much?
help.faq_answer_7: You earn money on the websites you visit and the apps you use everyday when you see Ads from our network or when you take an action. The amount you can earn depends on your profile value, your actions and your activity. If your profile, your demographics and your interests are well detailed you will earn more.
help.faq_question_8: 8. Do I earn money from all the Ads I see?
help.faq_answer_8: No, you only earn money from our Ads everywhere on the websites you visit and the app you use. Our network is growing up very fast and we have new partners everyday joining our solution.
help.faq_question_9: 9. How do I earn money for my actions?
help.faq_answer_9: You can earn money on specific actions like signing up to a service, downloading an app, online purchasing, liking a Facebook Page, video viewing...
help.faq_answer_10: Payout amount is only $5, when you reach this amount, you can fill out your payment details and receive your money.
help.faq_question_11: 11. How do I get paid and when?
help.faq_answer_11: You can receive your money by wire transfer or Paypal. Payments are automatically done every month on the 10th for your available earnings.
help.faq_question_12: 12. Do I have to report what I earned?
help.faq_answer_12: Yes, you do have to report what you earned even if you won't pay any taxes on it depending on your country tax threshold.

contact.welcome_text_1: Feel free to contact us for any questions or inquiries.
